constituent: revise, say, words, keitai, mouth, street, nail, spike
heisigStory: After completing the first draft, you revise it by nailing down your words and "hammering" them into shape.
hint: nailing the word lists om the wall
koohiiStory1: Revise, revise and revise until you have all the words nailed down.
koohiiStory2: Remember how Martin Luther revised the words of the catholic church and nailed his 95 Theses at the door of the church in Wittenberg?
myStory: xem lại. nói trên phố thì nên xem lại
